name: 💬 Lango Guesso 🗺️
description:
Uncover the homeland of lost civilizations using no other hints than how they named the world.
Each puzzle is procedurally generated.

Tips:

  • When a civilization discovers a region, they give a name from their language to that region
  • If multiple civilizations discovered a region, its name will be influenced by each civilization's language
  • Each language has its own unique characteristics
  • The world is a sphere

Lango Guesso is a puzzle game adapted from a single mechanic from a bigger project: exploring a fictional generated world through its inhabitant's cookbook.
To follow the development, and to see me cook a procedurally generated recipe, follow me on Twitter.

Made for the IGGI game jam 2022.

PS: Fuck cryptobros and NFTs .
